content:
# Miasteczko Studenckie AGH - About us

URL: https://miasteczko.agh.edu.pl/en/about-us.html
Crawled: 2025-03-20 00:54:11

About us

AGH University Student Campus is a truly unique place to live in

In 20 dormitories lives over
 7000 students
 - that makes AGH University Student Campus the biggest student estate in Poland

1,5 km distance to the Main Square, 
25 minutes by feet to the furthest AGH faculty
, dozens of tram and bus connections to every part of Cracow - everything is close when you live with us

360 cultural events 
during the academic year, in student clubs in our Campus - we are the heart of student culture in Cracow 

490 pln/month
 - the lowest dormitory rate in Cracow with a relatively highest room standard

All our residents have
 free access
 to laundry and sport objects (volleyball court, basketball court, football field and gyms) reservations.

AGH University Student Campus during holidays

From July to September AGH University Student Campus offers over 4000 accommodations in student hostels for tourists visiting Cracow. During the academic year Dormitory nr 2 BABILON is running a hostel, with 330 places in studio-like rooms with individual bathrooms and a kitchenettes. For more information visit 
our website
.

Facilities for the disabled

AGH University Student Campus discerns the needs of disabled people and tries to aid them as much as possible. By now, we've managed to create many conveniences for the disabled - each year we renovate one dormitory, which will be suitable for disabled people. Currently all dormitories in Comfort and Comfort+ standards are prepared for the disabled and well-equipped with elevators, ramps and practical bathrooms. All student clubs on the Campus are also well-adjusted. AGH University Student Campus constantly cooperates with 
Disability Support Department AGH
.
